name: Castiel, hanging [Tumblr permalink icon]
description: A custom permalink icon for your Tumblr dashboard. "Castiel is an angel of Heaven, who manifested on Earth inside his wessel, Jimmy Nowak... to stop the breaking of the the 66 Seals which will release Lucifer and start the Apocalypse. Over time he develops an empathy for the Winchesters, in particular the Model 70." *
